overview: SST offers a wide range of Co-Curricular Activities (CCAs) that complement the academic curriculum. CCAs provide students with opportunities to develop character, leadership, and teamwork skills.

ccas.name: Badminton
ccas.description: Developing skills in badminton through regular training and inter-school competitions.

ccas.name: Basketball
ccas.description: Training in basketball fundamentals, teamwork, and competitive play.

ccas.name: Fencing
ccas.description: Learning the art and sport of fencing, building discipline and quick reflexes.

ccas.name: Football
ccas.description: Developing football skills and sportsmanship through training and matches.

ccas.name: Table Tennis
ccas.description: Building agility and precision through competitive table tennis.

ccas.name: Taekwondo
ccas.description: Practising the Korean martial art of Taekwondo, developing self-discipline and physical fitness.

ccas.name: Touch Rugby
ccas.description: A non-contact version of rugby that builds teamwork and fitness.

ccas.name: Volleyball
ccas.description: Training in volleyball skills and strategies for inter-school competitions.

ccas.name: Guitar Ensemble
ccas.description: Playing guitar in an ensemble setting, performing at school events and public concerts.

ccas.name: Show Choir
ccas.description: Combining choral singing with choreography for dynamic performances.

ccas.name: Astronomy Club
ccas.description: Exploring the wonders of the universe through stargazing sessions, telescope usage, and astronomy knowledge.

ccas.name: Media Club
ccas.description: Developing skills in photography, videography, and media production.

ccas.name: Robotics@APEX
ccas.description: Building and programming robots for competitions like the First Lego League (FLL) and VEX Robotics.

ccas.name: Singapore Youth Flying Club (SYFC)
ccas.description: Learning about aviation through aeromodelling, drone flying, and flight simulation.

ccas.name: National Cadet Corps (NCC) - Land
ccas.description: A uniformed group that develops cadets into resilient and responsible citizens through military-inspired training.

ccas.name: National Police Cadet Corps (NPCC)
ccas.description: A uniformed group that develops character and leadership through police-related activities and community service.
